column1: Smoque BBQ////KT and BS were given a free sample of both sliced and chopped brisket because the nice guy preparing their order thought they should have some with their rack.  He unfortunately put sauce on the sliced portion
column2: so it was hard for me to really evaluate the sliced brisket for flavor.  It was moist
column4: not as smoky as it looks.  I would say above average for the Midwest.  Just don't let them sauce anything for you
column5: but that is my policy anyway
column6: regardless of the place and the sauce.
